verbose_text: As shown in XREF_FIG, immunohistochemical analysis of pancreatic tissue revealed an increase in the number of Ki67 positive and insulin positive cells in the ADMSCs and ADMSCs-BET groups, suggesting that their transplantation increased beta-cell proliferation, resulting in reduced blood glucose levels in mice with STZ induced diabetes.
evidence: Ki67-positive and insulin-positive cells in the ADMSCs and ADMSCs-BET groups, suggesting that their transplantation increased beta-cell proliferation
